skills.name: Skype for Business
skills.details: Discuss how to format links in Skype for Business. Provide an explanation on how to add a contact in Skype for Business. Provide an explanation on how to get status alerts for a contact in Skype for Business. Provide an explanation on how to access a Persistent Chat in Skype for Business and that only IS can create and add people to Chats.

skills.name: Team History & Structure
skills.details: Discuss the history and organization of the team.

skills.name: Scheduling
skills.details: Employee should utilize Outlook and the Hyland Scheduler to schedule a meeting with their TL and Manager during their 2nd week with the team to discuss the topics below.

skills.name: Strengths
skills.details: Leadership  needs to initiate this conversation to determine what the employee's strengths are and what areas need to be focused on.
